xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/47145-Augustine: The Decline of the Roman Empire 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fexq7cUOGcQMpbNB9GoxX0AD0S3.jpg Augustine is a two-part, Italian-made mini-series about the influential theologian and church father Augustine of Hippo. The piece tells the story of his life from a teenager to his death at the age of 69.Much of the content for the scenes of him as a young and middle-aged man come from his Confessions, which is probably the earliest extant autobiography. Augustine: The Decline of the Roman Empire
